title: The Ring of Lost Souls
description: Larundel - A place plagued by lost souls. A Ring that has claimed a few of them. And a woman about to collide with a world she had forgotten about. When an abandoned mental asylum is set to be redeveloped, sinister events unfold in the community surrounding it. Isobel moves into the neighborhood looking for a new future only to find a past that she never knew belonged to her. Is she is a sane person living in an insane world or a crazy person floating in reality? Set in an actual abandoned mental asylum on the outskirts of Melbourne, Australia, THE RING OF LOST SOULS is a fast-paced ghost story that weaves together a blend of fantasy, Celtic mythology, urban legend and pure insanity.
author: Rachel Tsoumbakos
